section.title: tpl (str)
section.para: The definition of a template file:
The parameter can be set multiple times to get more templates in same configuration file.

listitem.para: fpath - path to the template file.
bsize - buffer size to evaluate the template (default: 1024).

section.para: Encrypts the text with the key using AES256 ECB encryption algorithm. The result is encoded in base64 format and stored in res. The parameter res must be a read-write variables. The parameters text and key can be static strings or strings with variables (dynamic strings).
This function can be used from ANY_ROUTE.
